Accept Welcome to Emerald Isle Casino, Dublin’s premier destination for an authentic gaming experience. Nestled in the heart of Ireland's vibrant capital, our casino offers a unique, offline-only environment where you can indulge in your favorite games. Visit us in Dublin to immerse yourself in a world of excitement and luxury. Contact Us About Us At Emerald Isle Casino, we pride ourselves on delivering a superior gaming experience. Our establishment, located in the bustling city center of Dublin, is dedicated to providing a warm, friendly atmosphere where players can enjoy a wide range of casino games. Unlike online casinos, Emerald Isle Casino offers an in-person experience, ensuring that every visit is filled with real-time excitement and interactions. Contact Us Activities and Games Emerald Isle Casino features an impressive selection of games to suit every taste. From classic table games like blackjack, roulette, and poker to a vast array of slot machines, we have something for everyone. Our professionally trained staff is always on hand to assist you and ensure that your gaming experience is enjoyable and seamless. Classic Table Games Step into the world of traditional casino elegance with our classic table games. At Emerald Isle Casino, you can try your luck at blackjack, where strategy meets excitement, or feel the thrill of the spinning wheel in roulette. Poker enthusiasts can test their skills in various poker games, enjoying the camaraderie and competition that only a live table can offer. Each game is hosted by our experienced dealers who ensure fair play and a welcoming atmosphere. Contact Us Slot Machines For those who prefer the flashing lights and thrilling sounds of slot machines, Emerald Isle Casino offers a vast array of options. From vintage reels to the latest video slots, our collection features games with various themes, pay lines, and bonus features. Whether you’re a seasoned player or a newcomer, you’ll find slots that cater to all levels of experience. Our slots are constantly updated to provide new and exciting opportunities to win big. Contact Us Specialty Games Beyond the traditional table and slot games, Emerald Isle Casino boasts a selection of specialty games designed to add variety and excitement to your visit. Try your hand at games like baccarat, craps, or even some unique offerings that are exclusive to our casino. These specialty games offer a fresh take on casino gaming, with unique rules and thrilling potential payouts. Our staff is always ready to explain the rules and help you get started. Contact Us Exclusive Events and Tournaments Emerald Isle Casino frequently hosts exclusive events and tournaments, adding an extra layer of excitement to our gaming floor. Whether it’s a high-stakes poker tournament, a themed blackjack night, or a slot machine competition, there’s always something happening at our casino. These events are designed to bring players together, create memorable experiences, and offer chances to win special prizes. Keep an eye on our events calendar and join us for these unique gaming opportunities. Contact Us Superior Gaming Experience Enjoy top-tier gaming with a wide variety of classic table games and state-of-the-art slot machines. Our selection caters to both seasoned players and newcomers, ensuring everyone finds their favorite way to play. Friendly Community Join a vibrant community of gaming enthusiasts. Our friendly and professional staff are dedicated to making your experience memorable, offering assistance and ensuring a welcoming atmosphere. Diverse Game Selection Explore a wide range of games, from classic table games like blackjack and poker to an extensive array of slot machines. There's something for every type of player at Emerald Isle Casino. Why Choose Emerald Isle Casino Authentic offline gaming experience, ensuring real-time excitement. Prime location in the heart of Dublin for easy access. Friendly and professional staff ready to assist you. A safe and secure environment for all players. Exclusive events and tournaments for extra excitement. A vibrant social atmosphere, perfect for meeting fellow enthusiasts. Frequently Asked Questions Can I play games online at Emerald Isle Casino? No, Emerald Isle Casino is strictly an offline casino. You must visit us in Dublin to enjoy our games. What types of games do you offer? We offer a wide range of games, including blackjack, roulette, poker, and various slot machines. Do you have any membership or loyalty programs? Yes, we offer a loyalty program that rewards regular players with exclusive benefits and promotions. What are your opening hours? We are open daily from 10 AM to 4 AM. Is there a dress code? Smart casual attire is recommended to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable experience for all our guests. Do you host special events or tournaments? Yes, we frequently host exclusive events and tournaments. Check our events calendar for upcoming activities. What Our Guests Are Saying John D. "Emerald Isle Casino is the best! The atmosphere is electric, and the staff are incredibly welcoming." "I especially love the variety of slot machines and the thrill of playing blackjack. Can't wait to visit again!" Sarah L. "A fantastic experience from start to finish. The games are top-notch, and the staff make you feel right at home." "The poker tables are well-run and always have a great crowd. Highly recommend Emerald Isle Casino!" Michael B. "This casino has it all - great games, friendly people, and an unbeatable location in Dublin." "The events and tournaments add an extra layer of excitement. I always have a great time here!" Emma W. "Emerald Isle Casino is my go-to spot for a fun night out. The ambiance is perfect, and the game selection is impressive." "The staff are professional and friendly, making every visit enjoyable. A must-visit in Dublin!" Liam K. "I love the diverse range of games and the friendly community at Emerald Isle Casino." "Whether it's a casual night out or a big event, this casino never disappoints. Highly recommended!" Sarah T. "I've been to many casinos, but Emerald Isle is one of the best. The atmosphere is always lively and the staff is friendly." "I've had a great experience every time I've visited. Highly recommend!" Contact Us Have any questions or need more information? Reach out to us using the form below. Accept Privacy Policy - Shielding Your Data with Respect Welcome to the Emerald Isle Casino, where we prioritize your privacy and commit to securing your data. This Privacy Policy is an extensive guide that explains how we handle your personal information when you visit our website. It's essential to thoroughly review this policy, as it outlines our practices regarding data collection, usage, disclosure, and protection. If you are not comfortable with the terms of this policy, please refrain from accessing the site. Collecting Your Information We may gather information about you in various ways. The types of information we collect on the site include: Personal Data: Personal information such as your name, shipping address, email address, and telephone number, along with demographic details like age, gender, hometown, and interests. These details are voluntarily provided when you register with the site or participate in specific activities related to the site. Derivative Data: Information automatically collected by our servers when you access the site, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, access times, and the pages you have viewed before and after accessing the site. Using Your Information We use your personal information to provide you with a personalized and efficient experience. We may use the information we collect about you via the site for the following purposes: Gathering anonymous statistical data and analysis for internal or third-party use. Creating and managing your account. Sending you notifications related to your account or order. Enabling user-to-user communications. Fulfilling and managing purchases, orders, payments, and other transactions related to the site. Generating a personal profile based on your preferences to enhance future visits to the site. Optimizing the efficiency and operation of the site. Monitoring and analyzing user behavior patterns to improve your overall experience. Notifying you about updates to the site. Offering new products, services, and recommendations tailored to your preferences. Performing other business operations as needed. Preventing fraudulent transactions, monitoring for theft, and protecting against criminal activity. Requesting feedback and contacting you about your use of the site. Resolving disputes and troubleshooting issues. Responding to product and customer service requests. Sending you a newsletter. Soliciting support for the site. Disclosure of Your Information We may disclose your information in certain situations. Your information may be shared as follows: In compliance with legal requirements. To investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies. To protect the rights, property, or safety of others. With third-party service providers for services such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance. With your consent or opportunity to withdraw consent for promotional purposes, as allowed by applicable laws. Security of Your Information We implement administrative, technical, and physical security measures to safeguard your personal information. While we strive to secure your data, please be aware that no security measures can guarantee complete protection against interception or misuse. If you suspect any unauthorized access or data breach, please contact us. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on this page. It is essential to regularly review this Privacy Policy to stay informed about any modifications. Changes to this Privacy Policy go into effect when the updated policy is posted on this page. Emerald Isle Casino Ireland emeraldisle@gmail.com Disclaimer Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Please be aware of gambling addiction Gambling should be approached in a responsible manner. Monitor your playtime and take breaks to avoid addiction. © 2023 Emerald Isle Casino. All rights reserved.
